name: Care Mania
description:
https://www.coregames.com/games/fedf88/caremania

Become a boss of this farm by helping animals. Save as much as possible by collecting resources and delivering your help to the cuties.

In game you need to satisfy the desires of animals. Then they can be taken home and you will be credited with one rescued animal. The one who saved the most is the hero. But along the way, other players will want to show that their CARE is stronger and your cart will undergo a series of attacks from opponents
